title: Greyed out client
body: When i changed my summoner ability this happened and then when i logged in again the next day as soon as i join a game it grays out and i cant select a champion. i keep getting a queue because of this, please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

The issue you're experiencing has been acknowledged by Riot and they're working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells) thread for more information and for how YOU can help speed up the fix.
